article.title: Raytheon Receives Nearly $60 Million Aerostat Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Andover, Massachusetts, was recently awarded a nearly $60 million contract for the support and sustainment, in all aspects, for the Rapid Aerostat Initial Deployment Legacy and Rapid Aerostat Initial Deployment Base Expeditionary Targeting and Surveillance Systems. The U.S. Army Space and Missile Defense Command, Contracting Acquisition Management Office, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
